title: Will the unlocked Pixel 5 work with my VZW account? I don't care about 5G.
content: I see there's a VZW specific Pixel 5 that I can't pre-order yet. There's also an unlocked Pixel 5 that claims to work on any network. Will the unlocked Pixel 5 work on VZW if I don't care about 5G so I can pre-order that one now?
